course_title: Topics in Computer Science: Information Security
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 20 / Seats Avail: 2Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
Prerequisites: CS 224 and CS 253


Department permission required, please email bnflood@emory.edu.


This course will cover topics on information security including authentication, access control, cryptography, vulnerability detection, threats to security, and control mechanisms to address such threats. Students will also learn principles of information assurance at the policy, procedural, and technical levels.
course_description: May be repeated for credit when topic varies. Pre/co-requisites vary with topic.
schedule_location: MW 1pm-2:15pm in Math & Science Center - W301
